name: Socialopoly
description:
Socialopoly is the board game that challenges you to become the King of social media.

Socialopoly is a game of buying, selling and trading different Social Networks, Smartphones, Search Engines, and more. Don't go bankrupt and be the first player to finish the game with the most money and you win. Play Socialopoly today.

Optional Game Features:

* 2D/2.5D/3D play modes
* Customize your player cards
* Change player names
* Increase or decrease the amount of money played in the game
